title: Echocardiography Patient Education: Smartphone Video-Based Learning Program

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Learners are graduate students with intermediate-level science knowledge, combining simulation/VR-based practical training with video learning. During the program, they systematically learn echocardiogram procedures using smartphone-based video content and VR simulations

learning_goals: Learners can accurately explain the purpose, procedures, and precautions of echocardiogram examinations
Learners can perform pre-, during-, and post-examination patient preparation tasks with ≥80% accuracy
Learners can achieve an average score of ≥4.5/5 on satisfaction surveys after video-based education
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
